practice_phrases: We don't.
我们不。
We don't need to.
我们不需要。
We don't need to go.
我们不需要去。
We don't need to wait.
我们不需要等。
We don't need to agree with her.
我们不需要同意她。
We don't need to work together.
我们不需要一起工作。
We don't need to go near the entrance.
我们不需要去入口附近。
We don't need to walk towards the bus.
我们不需要朝公交车走去。
We don't need to turn left at the corner.
我们不需要在拐角处左转。
We don't need to stand near the post office.
我们不需要站在邮局附近。
Standing.
站着。
Standing there.
站在那边。
She is standing.
她站着。
He is standing near.
他站在附近。
That person is standing there.
那个人站在那边。
The boy is standing near the entrance.
男孩站在入口附近。
The girl is standing opposite the post office.
女孩站在邮局对面。
We don't need to be standing here.
我们不需要站在这里。
That child is standing near the bus.
那个孩子站在公交车附近。
The one standing at the corner is my friend.
站在拐角的那个人是我的朋友。
Wait until tomorrow.
等到明天。
Wait until later.
等到以后。
I'll wait until morning.
我等到早上。
Can you wait until then?
你能等到那时吗？
We should wait until she agrees.
我们应该等到她同意。
I'll wait until the bus arrives.
我等到公交车到。
We don't need to wait until tomorrow morning.
我们不需要等到明天早上。
Can we wait until the child is ready?
我们能等到孩子准备好吗？
I'm standing here waiting until you come back.
我站在这里等到你回来。
She said wait until the boy with the green shirt arrives.
她说等到穿绿色衬衫的男孩到。
Other people.
其他人。
What about everybody else?
其他人呢？
I agree with them.
我同意其他人。
Where are the others?
其他人在哪里？
Everybody else is standing there.
其他人站在那边。
We should wait for other people.
我们应该等其他人。
I don't think everybody else is right about this.
我认为其他人对这个不对。
Other people need to turn left at the corner.
其他人需要在拐角处左转。
Everybody else is walking towards the bus near the entrance.
其他人朝入口附近的公交车走去。
We don't need to wait until everybody else agrees with her.
我们不需要等到其他人同意她。
Ready?
准备好？
I'm ready now.
我现在准备好。
Are you ready yet?
你准备好了吗？
She is almost ready.
她快准备好了。
The child is not ready.
孩子还没准备好。
We need to get ready soon.
我们需要快点准备好。
I'll be ready when the bus arrives.
公交车到的时候我会准备好。
Other people are ready to turn left at the corner.
其他人准备好在拐角处左转。
We don't need to wait until she is ready.
我们不需要等到她准备好。
The boy with the green shirt is standing there ready.
穿绿色衬衫的男孩站在那边准备好了。
All ready?
都准备好？
We're all ready now.
我们都准备好了。
Are they all ready?
他们都准备好了吗？
Not everyone is ready yet.
还没都准备好。
The children are all ready.
孩子们都准备好了。
We need everyone to be ready.
我们需要大家都准备好。
Other people will be all ready very soon.
其他人很快都准备好。
When we're all ready we can turn left.
我们都准备好就能左转。
I'm waiting until the people near the entrance are all ready.
我在等入口附近的人都准备好。
We don't need to stand here until everybody is all ready.
我们不需要站在这里等到大家都准备好。
Everybody else is ready.
其他人都准备好。
Is everybody else ready now?
其他人都准备好了吗？
I think they're ready.
我认为其他人都准备好。
Everybody else is ready to go.
其他人都准备好去了。
When will everybody else be ready?
其他人什么时候都准备好？
Everybody else is ready near the entrance.
其他人在入口附近都准备好。
I'm waiting until everybody else is ready to turn.
我在等其他人都准备好转弯。
We can go when everybody else is ready to walk.
其他人都准备好走的时候我们能去。
The boy said everybody else is ready to go towards the bus.
男孩说其他人都准备好朝公交车去。
We don't need to stand here until everybody else is ready.
我们不需要站在这里等到其他人都准备好。
Until everybody else is ready.
等到其他人都准备好。
Wait until everybody else is ready.
等到其他人都准备好。
I'll wait until they're ready.
我会等到其他人都准备好。
Can we wait until everyone's ready?
我们能等到其他人都准备好吗？
She's standing there until everybody's ready.
她站在那边等到其他人都准备好。
We should wait until everybody else is ready.
我们应该等到其他人都准备好。
I'm here near the entrance until everybody else is ready.
我在入口附近等到其他人都准备好。
The child with black hair will wait until everybody else is ready.
黑头发的孩子会等到其他人都准备好。
We need to stand at the corner until everybody else is ready.
我们需要站在拐角等到其他人都准备好。
I don't think we should wait until everybody else is ready to turn left.
我认为我们不应该等到其他人都准备好左转。

lego: stand until everybody else is ready
站着等到其他人都准备好
practice_phrases: Stand until everybody's ready.
站着等到其他人都准备好。
We should stand until they're ready.
我们应该站着等到其他人都准备好。
I'll stand until everybody's ready.
我会站着等到其他人都准备好。
Can you stand until everyone's ready?
你能站着等到其他人都准备好吗？
The boy will stand until everybody's ready.
男孩会站着等到其他人都准备好。
We should stand here until everybody else is ready.
我们应该站在这里等到其他人都准备好。
I think we need to stand until everybody else is ready.
我认为我们需要站着等到其他人都准备好。
The children near the entrance will stand until everybody else is ready.
入口附近的孩子们会站着等到其他人都准备好。
The girl with the yellow dress said stand until everybody else is ready.
穿黄色连衣裙的女孩说站着等到其他人都准备好。
We don't need to stand until everybody else is ready.
我们不需要站着等到其他人都准备好。
